title: Store Manager
description: alza cz the biggest e shop central europe has started to establish its presence austria for our commercial team vienna we are looking for top talents specifically native germans with multilingual ability store manager job summary it s your job as a store manager to build a new showroom interesting location vienna and to build and manage the various teams that engage customers this dynamic environment this role you lead the people that help customers achieve ownership learn new skills get technical support adaptable and flexible by nature you re composed and collected as you balance the diverse needs of your teams the midst of constant change key qualifications proven ability to drive positiv customer experiences that build loyalty and deliver measurable results ability to manage your new team within a complex environment strong communication skills to clearly impart the alza vision to the teams you oversee additional requirements you have demonstrated leadership ability with at least five years of experience a customer facing sales setting cross industry experience is welcome a retail background is not necessary you have a passion for learning about new technology fluent german and czech or slovak language is required you ll need to be flexible with your schedule your work hours be based on business needs description as a store manager you inspire teams to deliver measurable results for the store s various product sectors you lead a sales force that discovers customers needs your team helps maintain customers trust alza and products portfolio which offer alza the training staff you coach teach customers how to get the most out of products portfolio which offer alza you build these lines of business by selecting and developing a knowledgeable talent pool addition to team building you create excitement around products launch programs and initiatives you re responsible for upholding our high standards regarding communication and confidentiality please send your application to kontakt alza cz a s jateční praha sales career produkt karriere at gmbh

coordination and management of cros manage interactions with other departments and relevant functional areas your requirements advanced degree natural sciences msc phd experience as a cra and minimum of years of clinical management experience profound knowledge of gcp data protection laws clinical trial directives and other regulations and guidelines for the conduct of clinical trials supervisory managerial experience including supervision of cros and or cras are a must excellent communication presentation interpersonal independent problem solving financial management and leadership skills team spirit proactive and goal oriented working style ability to manage multiple competing priorities function independently and detail oriented excellent knowledge of english written and oral excellent computer skills may be required to travel to supervise and coordinate clinical studies we are legally required to publish the minimum monthly gross salary for this position according to the
